price: Nuko bacura umugambi mubisha, maze natwe tuburizamo umugambi wabo batabizi.
arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا وَمَكَرۡنَا مَكۡرٗا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamakarū makran wamakarnā makran wahum lā yashʿurūna
